ComicInfo.Title: Herbie's Quiet Saturday Afternoon!; Magic Maker!; Thanksgiving Day!; The Riddle of Robert O'Malley
ComicInfo.Summary: Herbie's father thinks his son will never amount to anything or do anything. Herbie goes to the zoo where he takes on a tiger. Then, he saves Senator Stevens who is lost at sea. Finally, he stops an alien invasion.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 19:11:50. [Issue ID 14745]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,John Forte,Emil Gershwin,Ogden Whitney,John Forte,Emil Gershwin
ComicInfo.Inker: Ogden Whitney,John Forte,Emil Gershwin,Ogden Whitney,John Forte,Emil Gershwin
